dimension: overall (Machine overcast top & bottom.): 26 x 55 in. (66.04 x 139.7 cm)
title: Airline Samples
description: Unidentified but possibly PanAm fabric in various weaves, blue & brown. Nos. 6 - 13 are more boldly woven patterns in plain & plaid. Double weave. Two variations of color (blue & brown) woven together. Approx. 2\"  plaid squares surrounded by 1\" bands. (Smoke blue - large square)
